snippet.title: DEAD OR ALIVE 6 - Iron Fist Apprentice and The Drunken Master
snippet.description:
Two fan favorites return to the DEAD OR ALIVE 6 Roster! Brad Wong known as "The Drunken Fighter" is a master of Zui Ba Xian Quan. He uses his drunken style to confuse opponents while striking adversaries from unusual stances ranging from hang-standing and facing backwards to laying down on the ground. 

Joining Brad Wong is the traveling martial arts scholar, Eliot. Known as "The Apprentice of the Iron Fist", Eliot launches at opponents with a furious volley of consecutive Xingyi Quan attacks thanks to techniques learned from his master, Gen Fu.

Both fighters can be seen punching and kicking in the new battle arena entitled "UNFORGETTABLE". The gallery-like stage is comprised of a number of nostalgic locations from previous DOA titles, including their fully-operational Danger Zones.

Pre-orders are now available on all platforms. To get more information on the pre-order bonuses and digital deluxe please go here: https://teamninja-studio.com/doa6/us/products.html

Steel Book case available from Gamestop (U.S.) and EB Games (Canada) when you pre order DOA6 while supplies last.

[official site] http://teamninja-studio.com/doa6/
[official twitter] https://twitter.com/DOATEC_OFFICIAL
[official facebook] https://facebook.com/deadoralivegame
[official twitch] https://twitch.tv/Deadoralivegame

#DEADORALIVE6 #BRADWONG #ELIOT
